data.title: Jada Pinkett Smith and Will Smith's Open Relationship Timeline
data.meta_description: Here's a complete breakdown of Jada Pinkett Smith and Will Smith's marriage, including details on their current drama involving August Alsina.
data.text:
Will Smith and Jada Pinkett Smith have faced tons of ridiculous speculation about their relationship (see: August Alsina casually revealing that he was in an "entanglement" with Jada while she was married). But while that was all extremely !!!!, it isn‚Äôt the first time Will and Jada have dealt with the internet flipping TF out about their marriage. They‚Äôve been shutting down rumors for literally decades‚Äîfrom claims they‚Äôre in an open relationship and speculation they‚Äôre swingers to totally false whispers that Jada cheated on Will with Marc Anthony. And, let's not forget SlapGate‚Ñ¢Ô∏è at the 2022 Oscars.

As usual, the truth is waaay more complicated than a bunch of online drama. In October 2023, Jada revealed that she and Will have actually been separated since 2016 because they were "exhausted with trying" to work out their relationship. So, let's go back to the beginning and break down the rumors with a handy (and mildly thirsty) timeline‚Äîstarting with how Will and Jada met and fell in love, ofc.

Circa 1994

Will met Jada on the set of Fresh Prince of Bel-Air, but he was married to Sheree Zampino at the time. Once he and Sheree split, Will straight-up called Jada and asked if she was seeing anybody. When she said no, he replied, ‚ÄúCool. You‚Äôre seeing me now.‚Äù The rest is history!

New Year‚Äôs Eve 1997

Jada and Will got married while she was pregnant with their son, Jaden‚Äîalthough initially, Jada didn‚Äôt love the idea of making their relationship ‚Äúofficial‚Äù on paper. Here‚Äôs what she told People in a 2019 cover story:

‚ÄúI never wanted to get married. But my mother was like, ‚ÄòYou have to get married‚Äô‚Äîshe‚Äôs so old-school‚Äîand Will wanted a family. So I said, ‚ÄòAlright, maybe it‚Äôs something I should do.‚Äô‚Äù

August 23, 2011

Amid rumors that Jada was hooking up with Marc Anthony, the couple released a statement to People. BEHOLD:

‚ÄúAlthough we are reluctant to respond to these types of press reports, the rumors circulating about our relationship are completely false. We are still together, and our marriage is intact.‚Äù

Meanwhile, Jada‚Äôs rep said, ‚ÄúAll the rumors regarding Marc Anthony and Jada are false. Completely untrue. As for [the reports of a split between] Will and Jada, I‚Äôm not commenting on their personal life.‚Äù

August 14, 2013

Otherwise known as the fated day Jada hopped on Facebook to clarify comments that had everyone thinking she and Will were in an open marriage (basically, she said Will could ‚Äúdo whatever he wants‚Äù):

‚ÄúHere is how I will change my statement...Will and I BOTH can do WHATEVER we want, because we TRUST each other to do so. This does NOT mean we have an open relationship...this means we have a GROWN one.‚Äù

June 3, 2015

Jada gave an interview with Howard Stern, saying, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not the kind of woman that believes that a man‚Äôs not gonna be attracted to other women. It‚Äôs just not realistic. And just because your man is attracted to another woman doesn‚Äôt mean he doesn‚Äôt love you. And it doesn‚Äôt mean he‚Äôs gonna act on it.‚Äù

August 3, 2015

Amid yet another round of rumors that Will and Jada were splitting, Will hit Facebook and denied that they were getting a divorce:

‚ÄúUnder normal circumstances, I don‚Äôt usually respond to foolishness. (Because it‚Äôs contagious). But so many people have extended me their ‚Äòdeepest condolences‚Äô that I figured ‚Äî‚ÄòWhat the hell...I can be foolish too!‚Äô So, in the interest of redundant, repetitious, over & over-again-ness...Jada and I are...NOT GETTING A DIVORCE!!!!!!!!!!!!! : -) I promise you all ‚Äîif I ever decide to divorce my Queen‚ÄîI SWEAR I‚Äôll tell you myself! #Dumb People Should Have to Wear Scarlet D‚Äôs.‚Äù

Meanwhile, Jada hit up Twitter with this:

Is now a good time to mention that 2015 was also the year Jada was introduced to August Alsina? Just casually saying!

June 25, 2017

Jada and August attended the 2017 BET Awards together.

July 21, 2017

Jada showed up on Watch What Happens Live and said the wildest rumor she‚Äôs ever heard about her family is that she and Will are swingers: ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs the craziest one. It‚Äôs constant. And I‚Äôm like, yo, I wish. I wish.‚Äù

June 30, 2020

During an interview with Angela Yee, August claimed that he and Jada dated while she was married and that her marriage was open at the time.

‚ÄúI actually sat down with Will and had a conversation due to the transformation from their marriage to life partnership that they‚Äôve spoken on several times and it not involving romanticism,‚Äù he said, adding that he ‚Äútotally gave myself to that relationship for years of my life and I truly and really, really deeply loved and have a ton of love for her.‚Äù

Oh, and August also claimed Will gave them his ‚Äúblessing.‚Äù

Later! That! Day!

Less than 24 hours after August‚Äôs interview dropped, Page Six got in touch with Jada‚Äôs reps, who said his claims were ‚Äúabsolutely not true.‚Äù

July 10, 2020

Jada (sitting across from Will) opened up about the sitch with August during an episode of the always iconic Red Table Talk, confirming that she did have a relationship with him‚Äîand that she and Will were separated at the time.

‚ÄúWe decided that we were going to separate for a period of time and you go figure out how to make yourself happy and I‚Äôll figure out how to make myself happy,‚Äù Will said, while Jada added, ‚ÄúFrom there, as time went on, I got into a different kind of entanglement with August.‚Ä¶Yes, it was a relationship, absolutely.‚Äù

That said, Jada denied that Will ever gave permission to August, saying, ‚ÄúOne thing I want to clean up‚Ä¶about you giving ‚Äòpermission,‚Äô which is...the only person that can give permission in that circumstance is myself.‚Äù

If you‚Äôre wondering how August felt about Red Table Talk, apparently the answer is not great because he seemingly subtweeted Jada, saying, ‚ÄúIf you have something to say, say it w/ ya CHEST, kids. It‚Äôs always very perplexing ‚Äôcause I real deal be showing people genuine love. Whole time that envy eating ya lil heart. Anyway, NEXT!!‚Äù

July 13, 2020

Believe it or not, but the Smith fam is all good following the Red Table Talk drama. Well, at least that‚Äôs what Us Weekly is saying.

‚ÄúThe Smiths as a family are really glad they addressed this and put everything out in the open,‚Äù their source says. ‚ÄúWill and Jada, at the end of the day, are like a normal couple who just happen to be glorified because they‚Äôre famous. They have fought. They have reconciled. At the end of the day, they do love each other.‚Äù Cool-cool-cool.

Will and Jada also think everyone is blowing this whole thing ‚Äúout of proportion,‚Äù with the source adding, ‚ÄúAt the end of the day, what hasn‚Äôt changed is the love that Will and Jada have for each other and the deep love that their children have for them.‚Ä¶They are an extremely close family, famous or not.‚Äù

So, where does that leave Will and Jada? Considering that he told his wife, ‚ÄúI could love you through anything,‚Äù it looks like there‚Äôs no drama to see here!

October 27, 2021

Jada revealed during an episode of Red Table Talk that it takes work to maintain a spark in the bedroom.

‚ÄúIt‚Äôs hard.‚Ä¶The thing Will and I talk about a lot is the journey. We started in this at a very young age, 22 years old.‚Ä¶I think you expect your partner to know‚Äîespecially when it comes to sex. It‚Äôs like, ‚ÄòWell, if you love me, you should know. If you love me, you should read my mind.‚Äô That‚Äôs a huge pitfall,‚Äù Jada said.

She added that she still occasionally feels ‚Äúuncomfortable‚Äù expressing her desires but maintains that it is ‚Äúdeeply healthy.‚Ä¶It‚Äôs something that we don‚Äôt talk about a lot and there‚Äôs so much fantasy around it.‚Äù

November 9, 2021

Will‚Äôs eponymous memoir comes out, and the actor doesn‚Äôt hold back on the entire arc of his relationship with Jada, starting at the very beginning. The pair initially met on the set of The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air, which Jada unsuccessfully auditioned for. But it wasn‚Äôt until later that the two connected on a much deeper level and became practically inseparable.

The book reads, ‚ÄúMy divorce from Sheree wasn‚Äôt yet final, so Jada and I decided it would be prudent if we kept our relationship under wraps. (We were both pretty famous, and we felt it just wouldn‚Äôt have been a great look. The blessed yet unintended consequence was that we spent every single moment together, just us. The first three or four months were as wild a romantic whirlwind as our bodies could have possibly handled.‚Ä¶We fit together so naturally, and our energies combined exponentially in a way that felt like old friends more than new lovers. We had an unspoken language, and everything we focused on flourished.‚Äù *swoon*

However, after a number of years, the couple began to run into issues. In his novel, Will described it as ‚Äúsuffering the brutal death of our romantic fantasies, the burning away of the idealistic illusion of the perfect marriage and the perfect family. Neither of us wanted a divorce; we knew we loved each other, and some aspects of our union were magical. But the structure of the life that we had established was strangling both of us.‚Äù

Eventually, the two were able to compromise and reconcile after embracing what Will called ‚Äúthe power of loving in freedom,‚Äù which allowed them to be ‚Äúsimultaneously 100 percent bound together and 100 percent free.‚Äù

November 10, 2021

Oprah interviewed the Men in Black star about his relationship with Jada and questioned him about specific excerpts in his memoir, including his use of the phrase ‚Äúloving freedom.‚Äù

The actor responded, ‚ÄúYou love in freedom with everybody except your partner.‚Äù He then explained how people tend to lend more space in friendships or relationships with their children than they do in a conventional marriage. However, Will said, ‚ÄúI think the difficulty that people have and difficulty in discussing it is people only think in terms of sex.‚Äù

He added, ‚ÄúPeople are trying to put something on it: ‚ÄòWill and Jada‚Äîwhat they doing with other people?‚Äô Will and Jada ain‚Äôt really doing too much of nothin‚Äô. Will and Jada are on a spiritual journey to cleanse the poisonous, unloving parts of our hearts. And we‚Äôre doing it together in this lifetime no matter what.‚Äù

The actor noted that their relationship is better than ever now.

‚ÄúMe and Jada, to this day, if we start talking, it‚Äôs four hours. It‚Äôs four hours if we exchange a sentence. It‚Äôs the center of why we‚Äôve been able to sustain [our relationship] and why we are still together, not choking the life out of each other‚Äîthe ability to work through issues. I‚Äôve never met another person that I connect with in conversation more blissfully and productively than Jada.‚Äù

February 27, 2022

At the 2022 SAG Awards, E! red carpet host Laverne Cox took a moment to speak with the couple and mentioned that she was thankful ‚Äúfor all the years of joy you‚Äôve brought us. We can‚Äôt wait for more Red Table Talk and more ‚Äòentanglements,‚Äô‚Äù to which Jada laughed and responded, ‚ÄúNo more of those!‚Äù

March 13, 2022

Will Smith was interviewed by Gayle King on CBS Sunday Morning and shut down speculation that he and Jada ever accused each other of cheating in the past. ‚ÄúNever. There‚Äôs never been infidelity in our marriage.‚Ä¶And we have never surprised one another with anything ever.‚Ä¶I have decided that chatter about my life can be of a benefit to people. I think that chatter is the first stage to having a real conversation and being able to truly explore if some of the things in your heart are loving or poisonous.‚Äù

Welp, that certainly clears things up!

March 27, 2022

At the 2022 Oscars, Will and Jada stunned on the red carpet, but things took a v awkward turn for the couple later that night. After presenter Chris Rock made a joke about Jada (who has spoken openly about having a hair loss condition) looking like the star of G.I. Jane 2, Will made it clear he didn‚Äôt appreciate the crack. He took to the stage to smack Chris and told him to ‚Äúkeep my wife‚Äôs name out of your f*cking mouth,‚Äù which was censored on TV. From the silence of the audience and the look on Chris‚Äôs face, it def seems like the reaction was 100 percent unscripted.

April 4, 2022

Things even further took a turn when it was revealed by sources that Jada wished Will hadn‚Äôt slapped Chris at the Oscars. ‚ÄúIt was in the heat of the moment, and it was him overreacting. He knows that, she knows that. They‚Äôre in agreement that he overreacted,‚Äù a source told Us Weekly. The source continued, saying Jada is ‚Äúnot one of these women that needs protecting. He didn‚Äôt need to do what he did, she didn‚Äôt need protecting. She‚Äôs not a wallflower. She‚Äôs a strong woman, an opinionated woman, and she can fight her own battles. But she will stand by him.‚Äù

News of this came after Will issued a public apology not only to the Academy but also to Chris himself. The statement in full is as follows:

‚ÄúViolence in all of its forms is poisonous and destructive. My behavior at last night‚Äôs Academy Awards was unacceptable and inexcusable. Jokes at my expense are a part of the job, but a joke about Jada‚Äôs medical condition was too much for me to bear and I reacted emotionally.

‚ÄúI would like to publicly apologize to you, Chris. I was out of line and I was wrong. I am embarrassed and my actions were not indicative of the man I want to be. There is no place for violence in a world of love and kindness.

‚ÄúI would also like to apologize to the Academy, the producers of the show, all the attendees, and everyone watching around the world. I would like to apologize to the Williams family and my King Richard family. I deeply regret that my behavior has stained what has been an otherwise gorgeous journey for all of us.

‚ÄúI am a work in progress.

‚ÄúSincerely,

Will‚Äù

April 5, 2022

An insider revealed that despite the stress of the Oscars moment, Will and Jada ‚Äústick together through thick and thin‚Äù because ‚Äúthey have been through a lot together and this is just another battle for them.‚Äù Well‚Ä¶that settles that, until‚Ä¶that! very! same! day! singer August Alsina (yes, THAT August Alsina) dropped a new song alluding to his ‚Äúentanglement‚Äù with Jada. *takes deep breaths*

The lyrics that everyone‚Äôs zeroing in on go a little something like this: ‚ÄúWell, of course some sh*t is bound to go down when there‚Äôs a billion dollars on the elevator / Well, of course some sh*t is bound to go down when you tangled up with the world‚Äôs favorite.‚Äù I mean‚Ä¶you don‚Äôt have to look that into it.

A refresher: This isn‚Äôt the first time August has been public about his relationship with Jada in a song. Last July, he released one called‚Ä¶you guessed it‚Ä¶‚ÄúEntanglement.‚Äù

While we‚Äôre at it, August also had this to say post-Oscars:

The caption included: ‚ÄúChoose peace‚Ä¶I‚Äôm a Walking Billboard & Network Simply Desiring to Televise & Broadcast Love, the love, grace, and healing embrace of God, Good Music that‚Äôs healing (w/ a lil bit of nasty).‚Äù Oop!

August 13, 2022

Months after SlapGate, Will and Jada were spotted out together at none other than celeb hot spot Nobu Malibu. In the pics, which were captured by TMZ, Will could be seen leading the way out of the restaurant, while Jada followed while holding him. And if the duo‚Äôs general vibe is any indication of where they‚Äôre at, all signs point to significantly better because before getting into their car, Will actually flashed a peace sign to a spectator who called his name.

The sighting is also on the heels of Will‚Äôs apology video, wherein the actor clarifies that (1) he still hasn‚Äôt heard from Chris and (2) he ultimately needs to move on with his life. Noted!!

December 2, 2022

Will and Jada made a stunning entrance for their first red carpet appearance since the Oscars at the premiere of the actor's latest film, Emancipation.

Just a few weeks prior, the celeb had taken a moment to open up about both the project and the Oscars controversy in an interview with Fox 5 DC reporter Kevin McCarthy, saying, ‚ÄúI completely understand that if someone is not ready. I would absolutely respect that and allow them their space to not be ready...My deepest concern is my team‚Äî[director Antoine Fuqua] has done what I think is the greatest work of his entire career.‚Äù He added, ‚ÄúMy deepest hope is that my actions don't penalize my team.‚Äù

December 22, 2022

Will did a takeover on Red Table Talk pegged to his movie Emancipation and even filmed a family trivia segment with his three children ü•∫:

October 11, 2023

Jada is releasing her own memoir, Worthy, on October 17, and she spoke to Hoda Kotb at The Today Show to promote the project. During the interview, Jada revealed that she and Will have actually been separated since 2016 and that while it isn't "a divorce on paper," they were "exhausted with trying" to work out their relationship.

When asked why they hadn't publicly addressed their separation in seven years, Jada shared that they "weren't ready" as they were "still trying to figure out, between the two of us, how to be in partnership."

She also said that she "made a promise that there will never be a reason for us to get a divorce," and that they "will work through ... whatever."

December 9, 2023

"I nearly didn‚Äôt even attend the Oscars that year, but I‚Äôm glad I did," Jada told the Daily Mail's YOU Magazine (via People). "I call it the 'holy slap' now because so many positive things came after it."

"That moment of the sh*t hitting the fan is when you see where you really are. After all those years trying to figure out if I would leave Will‚Äôs side, it took that slap for me to see I will never leave him," she continued.

May 15, 2024

Will said the following to Entertainment Tonight at a screening of his upcoming action movie, Bad Boys: Ride or Die: "I have always been blessed that there has never been a time in my life when I didn't look to the side and have a ride or die right there...Jada is one of the most gangsta ride-or-dies I've ever had."

May 30, 2024

The celebs stepped out with sons Trey and Jaden, and daughter Willow for the Los Angeles premiere of Bad Boys: Ride or Die. Also in the mix was Will's mother-in-law Adrienne Banfield-Norris. S'cute!

June 16, 2024

Jada celebrated Father‚Äôs Day by thanking Will for being a ‚Äúdevoted‚Äù dad in a sweet Instagram tribute alongside a hilarious snap of the actor sleeping while surrounded by his family, including ex-wife Sheree Zampino. ‚ÄúWill thank you for being a devoted girl dad/boy dad and doing all you do. Happy Father‚Äôs Day‚Ä¶you deserve the rest‚ú®,‚Äù read the ü•∫‚ù§Ô∏è caption.

Aaaaaand that's pretty much all we know for now! Stay tuned for more updates from Will and Jada.
